# What is <!--StartFragment-->**Machine learning** ???

<!--EndFragment-->

<!--StartFragment-->

> **Machine learning** is a Process of data analysis that automatic analytical model building. **Machine Learning**is the branch of **artificial** **intelligence** based on  idea that systems can learn from data, identify patterns and make decisions with minimal human intervention.
>
>
>
> <!--StartFragment-->
>
> **Machine Learning** is the study that gives computer the capability to learn without being explicitly programmed. **Machine Learning** is one of the most exciting technologies that one would have ever come across. As it is evident from the name, **Machine Learning** gives the computer that makes it more similar to humans: ***The ability to learn***. **Machine Learning**is actively being used today, perhaps in many more places than one would expect.

# **Machine Learning has following** <!--StartFragment-->**Intelligence are composed:**

<!--EndFragment-->

<!--StartFragment-->

* Reasoning
* Learning
* Perception
* Problem Solving
* Linguistic Intelligence
